lcQuestion2.p: Aligning the HR business unit and functional area strategies to the organizational strategy creates which desired outcome?

lcAnswerContent2.p: Creating a line-of-sight between individual work and organizational results.
Demonstrating concern with only the people aspects of the organization.
Acting as a critical support unit of the corporate strategy.
Aligning both a cost management and profit focus for all.

lcFeedbackCorrect2.p: As a management system (strategy) is aligned or cascaded through each core business function it becomes more operational and tactical as do the performance measures. This allows for everyone to understand how they contribute, individually, to the organizations success.
